name: basic
description: Basic report format with sections for each file

query.description: The search query or report title

generated_at.description: Timestamp when the report was generated (automatically added)

overall_summary.description: Overall summary of all findings (3-5 sentences)

section_summary.description: Summary of what this file contains related to the query (2-3 sentences)

section_quote.description: Most relevant code/text excerpt from the file (maximum 5-10 lines)
